title: Charming and spacious 3 bed 2.5 bath condo located on the Westside
map_address: centinela st near santa monica blvd
posting_body: ['This bright unit features a large kitchen with stainless steel appliances, built in shelving, marble countertops, separate pantry room and a breakfast nook area.', 'Extending out into the unit is an open floor plan showcasing a dining area and living room with fireplace including high ceilings, LED lights, hardwood floors and sliding doors out to an open patio area.', 'All three bedrooms are spacious with high ceilings and the master includes a walk-in closet.', 'Conveniently located near the metro line and major freeways, this unit is just moments to the beach, restaurants and shops.', 'To request a showing please reply with the date and time you would like to see the unit and the best number / email to contact you so we can confirm the appointment.', 'west LA, westside, silicon beach, mar vista, Brentwood , Westwood, lamr, centinela ave']
